entities.name: trunk
entities.description: The trunk is a container that stores Harry's belongings. It is mentioned as being stored in a vault at Gringotts Wizarding Bank in London.

entities.name: gringotts wizarding bank
entities.description: Gringotts Wizarding Bank is a financial institution that stores Harry's fortune. It is located in London.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is the location of Gringotts Wizarding Bank where Harry's vault is stored.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that Harry has inherited from his father. It is used to make him invisible.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is trying to get his money out of his vault at Gringotts Wizarding Bank in London.

entities.name: muggle police
entities.description: The Muggle Police are a group of non-magical law enforcement officers. Harry is worried about explaining himself to them if he gets caught with his broomstick and spellbooks.

entities.name: vault
entities.description: The vault is a secure storage facility at Gringotts Wizarding Bank where Harry's fortune is stored.

relationships.description: Harry owns the trunk, which contains his belongings and spellbooks.
Harry possesses the Invisibility Cloak, which he has inherited from his father.
Harry has an account at Gringotts Wizarding Bank where his vault is stored.
